start.state: The tracks lead me here, to this secret club built underneath a video game storage warehouse.

case.state: See? Cards are a man's game.
~name~ get a hold of yourself.
Well gang, there's only one way to find out what's underneath ~name~'s clothes.
Let's see what you've got under there.
Don't complain. You agreed to play.
Girls, it's time to get out of here!
What the character says just after they take their clothes off.
There's a science to this game. And I'm terrible at science.
I work hard for this body. May as well show it off!
I'm excited to see me naked too!
Talking is for wimps. It's time for action.
My plan is working perfectly so far!
How do you like that for small talk?
At least, Shaggy and Scooby are still free, maybe.
I work out. I know it, and I want you to know it too.
l hope Shaggy and Scooby are having better luck than I am.
Even your goosebumps are cute!
Very unimpressive.
Okay, here's the plan. You and Scooby create a diversion.
That's not the way I designed this plan.
The good news for you is that you all probably get to see some more of my body soon.
So, uh, did you see the game last night?
I knew I shouldn't have discarded those three sixes.
Nope. These cards are just stupid.

Don't take it off. You look better with it on.
